title: Tonal Tinnitus Masker
description: Acoustic neuromodulation tool using amplitude and frequency modulation
findFrequencyFirstText: To use this tool effectively, first find your tinnitus frequency using the Frequency Finder tool. Your saved frequency will be used automatically.
modulationTypeTooltip: AM (Amplitude Modulation) varies volume, FM (Frequency Modulation) varies pitch. Both combines both effects. CR uses randomized tone sequences.
modulationRateTooltip: How fast the modulation changes. Lower = slower, smoother changes. Higher = faster, more noticeable changes.
modulationDepthTooltip: How strong the modulation effect is. Lower = subtle, Higher = more pronounced.
baseFrequencyTooltip: The main frequency of the tone. Should match your tinnitus frequency for best results.
randomizedModulationDesc: Automatically vary modulation rate and depth within specified ranges
aboutNeuromodulationText: Acoustic neuromodulation uses modulated tones to potentially reduce tinnitus perception. AM/FM modulation and Coordinated Reset (CR) are research-backed approaches. Use at comfortable volume levels and consult healthcare providers for tinnitus management.
